name: wolvden simply dark
description:
Don't want to hurt your eyes at 2 am playing Wolvden? This theme got you covered, and turns the whole website dark! 

*some custom css profiles may be slightly altered by this theme
**still a work in progress - not everything is finished
additional_info:
v0.04 - some more minor changes. pings now visible
v.0.03 - mostly just made selections and options dark now
v0.02 - made even more things dark now! added some comments
v0.01 - initial upload
